text: What I fear American history will forget is that because the *loudest voice* on the coronavirus was always *Donald Trump*—and because almost *everything* he said about it was wrong and caused people to do the *wrong* things—he *singlehandedly* worsened the pandemic *considerably*

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
